com.putable.siteriter.server

Interface ConnectionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleConnectionFactory

    public interface ConnectionFactory
    An interface providing the ability to create AbstractConnections. A Server.Server(ConnectionFactory) is passed one, which it uses to produce connections in response to web hits.
    Author:
    ackley
